title.value: Estimation of heterosis hybrids of tomato, grown in open ground, with increased storability of fruits, according to economically valuable indicators
Изучение хозяйственно ценных признаков гетерозисных гибридов томата с повышенной лежкостью плодов в открытом грунте

journal.title: Bulletin of the Belarussian State Agricultural Academy : the guidance journal

person.name: Leshchina, N.Yu., Belarus State Academy of Agriculture, Gorki (Belarus)
Babak, O.G., National Academy of Sciences (Belarus). Institute of Genetics and Cytology

abstract.value: Our research showed the best hybrid combinations, according to the comple[ of economically valuable indicators, which combine high quality productivity, weight of fruit and duration of storage: F1 Dokhodny × Liniya – 8, F1 Kalinka × Liniya – 4, and F1 Liniya–B-3-1-8 × Liniya – 1/ One of the combinations was sent to the State inspection for plant varieties storage and testing under the name Storage F1. According to the results of state variety testing for economic usefulness, heterosis hybrid Storage F1 has been listed in the state register of localized varieties and hybrids since 2011.
